errors.207: Indicates there was a problem getting account data for one or more linked accounts, but the accounts who's data returned successfully is in the response. Do not aggregate balances and positions for this case.
errors.400: An error message indicating the validation problem with the request.
errors.401: An error message indicating the caller must pass a valid AuthToken in the HTTP authorization request header.
errors.403: An error message indicating the caller is forbidden from accessing this page.
errors.500: An error message indicating there was an unexpected server error.

fields.description:
Balances displayed by default, additional fields can be added here by adding positions or orders

Example:
fields=positions,orders
